Text.Text: Well met, adventurer.  I'm Riki.  It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
Waiting for you, actually.  I have information that will aid you in your quest.  I also have some items you may find useful.
There is a guard barracks located on this floor.  I've had a look inside, and they appear to be quite formidable.  I'm not certain that you're capable of defeating them.
Considering the nature of your quest, I don't think that's a viable option.  You don't want those guards coming up behind you when you face Isair and Madae.
I know that you are here on behalf of the Ten-Towns.  I know that you intend to put Isair and Madae in their place...
That is irrelevant.  Suffice it to say that I know.
Personally, I'd poison their food supply.  I think that would deal with them quite nicely... but then, you being a paladin, I suppose that is out of the question?
In that case, I would use a sleeping agent.  Such a non-fatal solution should be more in line with your code of ethics.  Eh?
Look.  If you step foot inside that barracks, you're dead.  If you die, then the Ten-Towns are finished.  Where is the honor in that solution?
Personally, I'd poison their food supply.  I think that would deal with them quite nicely...
No, you're going to have to collect the ingredients and then brew the potion yourself.  For a sleep potion you'll need to find a bonding agent, a virulent agent, and tainted demon's blood.
No, you're going to have to collect the ingredients and then brew the potion yourself.  For a poison potion you'll need to find a bonding agent, a virulent agent, and demon's blood.
You'll need an alchemy laboratory.  You can find one on the second floor in the Thayvian enclave.  Just get their permission to use it.
Good.  Once you have the potion just go to the kitchen and put it in the guards food supply.  When you have done so, come back and see me.  I have another matter of importance for you.
We'll discuss it when the time is right.  For now, you need to deal with the guard barracks.
Isair and Madae are forming a nation of half-breeds and freaks.  A place where any monstrosity from the four corners of the Realms can find a home.

The drow are a pure race.  We have been practicing the art of selective breeding for centuries.  Our beliefs are at odds with those of Isair and Madae.  Already, they have touched our camps in the Underdark with thier presence.  Eventually our two nations will come to blows... unless something can be done now to prevent it.
Why should we?  You are already here dealing with the matter.  It's much more efficient to simply aid you in your quest.
I suppose you've noticed that Isair and Madae are nowhere to be found?
Yes.  They are away arranging a meeting with the Cabal of Dragonkin.  They intend to negotiate a treaty and gain their aid in the war against the Ten-Towns.

They are a loose knit group of individuals who represent half-dragons throughout the Realms.  Normally they are of little consequence.  However, they have been known to rally together for a good cause.
Well, think about it.  Isair and Madae are forming a nation of half-breeds and freaks.  A land that any monstrosity can call home.
Here in the north there are snowfields, woodlands, lakes, valleys, and peaks.  Every type of terrain that dragonkin find appealing.  If the Ten-Towns fall...
Indeed it would.  It's imperative that these negotiations with the Cabal fail.  That treaty must not be signed.
Indeed you are.  A diplomatic party is due to arrive here any day now.  I would suggest that you intercept them.

Excellent.  They will arrive at the aerie atop the War Tower.  It may be reached via the passage to my left.  Oh, and you should be aware that your actions are certain to attract the attention of Isair and Madae...  Meanwhile, my work here is done.  I bid you farewell.

The drow are a pure race.  We have been practicing the art of selective breeding for centuries.  Our beliefs are at odds with those of Isair and Madae.  Already, they have touched our camps in the Underdark with thier presence.  Eventually our two nations will come to blows... unless something can be done now to prevent it.
Why should we?  You are already here dealing with the matter.  It's much more efficient to simply aid you in your quest.
Wait.  I need a moment of your time, if you please.  I have important information that pertains to your quest here.  I also have some items you may find useful.
I know that you are here on behalf of the Ten-Towns.  I know that you intend to put Isair and Madae in their place...
That is irrelevant.  Suffice it to say that I know.
Well met again, adventurer.  I'm Riki.  It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
Well met again.  How may I aid you?
Yes, I've noticed.  Come back to me when you have succeeded.  Until then, farewell.
Excellent.  Now, there is another matter that you must deal with.

Isair and Madae have allied with a deity named Iyachtu Xvim.  If you wish to succeed in your quest, you should sever their ties with him.  There is a priest of Ilmater imprisoned in the war tower.  Speak with him of the purification ritual.
Excellent.  Now, there is another matter that you must deal with.
Well met again.  Have you performed the Ilmater ritual?
It is important for you to do so.  Completing the ritual will severely weaken Isair and Madae.  Return to me once you have done so.
I see.  Tymora bless you, you're going to need all the luck you can get...  Anyway, there is a final matter that you must deal with.
Return to me when you have done so.
Waiting for you, sister.  I have information that will aid you in your quest.  I also have a few items that you may find useful.
Do not speak to me with such familiarity, male.  Have you forgotten your place?  You are in the presence of a matriarch!
That is a mistake that should be rectified forthwith... but let us forget the matter.  I have information that will aid you in your quest.  I also have a few items that you may find useful.
Indeed you have... but let us forget the matter.  I have information that will aid you in your quest.  I also have a few items that you may find useful.

Isair and Madae are in possession of a radiant pool.  With it, they can replenish their health and magical energies by drinking from it.  This could make them difficult to defeat...  Your alliance with Iyachtu Xvim will prevent you from being able to destroy this pool.

Isair and Madae are in possession of a radiant pool.  With it, they can replenish their health and magical energies by drinking from it.  This could make them difficult to defeat...  That priest knew the secret of its destruction.
Perhaps...  I pray that you are correct.  Anyway, there is a final matter that you must deal with.
It is important that you listen to what he has to say.  You will understand why if you hear him out.
Do not be a fool.  It is important that you perform the ritual.  I suggest that you return to the priest and agree to do so.
Oh?  Hmm.  Perhaps I got the ingredients wrong...  Well, what is done is done.  I am sorry for the guards, but we have other matters to attend to.
Do you still have need of me?
What are you doing here?
What is a fellow drow doing here?
What is a fellow drow doing here?
I must take my leave of you.  Farewell.
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
I would like to see what items you have.
I have no time for this.  Farewell.
I can always avoid the barracks.
I see.  So how do you suggest I deal with these guards?
I see.  So how do you suggest I deal with these guards?
I value the advice of a matriarch of our race.  How would you suggest I deal with these guards?
I value the advice of a matriarch of our race.  How would you suggest I deal with these guards?
Drow are not known for being forthright and helpful.  Why should I believe anything you have to say, Riki?
I am curious.  Why is a matriarch of our race here telling me this?
Just what do you know about my quest?
How do you know this?
Being drow myself, I suppose I should not be surprised that you know this.  I am curious how you know though.
I see.  So how do you suggest I deal with these guards?
I see.  So how do you suggest I deal with these guards?
Yes.  I refuse to use poison, Riki.
I still find that to be a less than honorable solution.
I see your point.  Do you have such a sleeping agent?
I dislike using poison, Riki.
Very well, do you have such a poison?
How do I brew a potion?
How do I brew a potion?
Very well, I shall do so.
Another matter?  What do you mean?
Very well, farewell.
Very well, farewell.
So I have heard.  What of it?
Then why do the drow not stop them?
If you wish to prevent it, why are the drow not taking a more active role in stopping the Legion?
Then why are our people not taking a more active role in stopping the legion?
I see.  So how do you suggest I deal with these guards?
I see.  So how do you suggest I deal with these guards?
Their absence has been noted.  Do you know where they are?
I did.  I suppose you know where they are?
I spoke with Xavier Torsend.  He mentioned they were away on some sort of business.
I have never heard of this Cabal.  Who are they?
Do you feel that such a cause exists?
Go on...
Yes, I see your point.  It would be a land ripe for the picking.
Am I correct in assuming that the negotiations are to take place here at the Hand?
Very well, I shall do so.
Drow are not known for being forthright and helpful.  Why should I believe any of this, Riki?
I am curious.  Why is a matriarch of our race here telling me this?
Wait.  Before you leave, I would see your wares again.
Very well, farewell.
Then why do the drow not stop them?
If you wish to prevent it, why are the drow not taking a more active role in stopping the Legion?
Then why are our people not taking a more active role in stopping the legion?
I see.  Very well, I shall deal with this envoy.
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
I would like to see what items you have.
Just what do you know about my quest?
How do you know this?
Being drow myself, I suppose I should not be surprised that you know this.  I am curious how you know though.
I see.  So what is this information that you have?
I see.  So what is this information that you have?
I see.  So what is this information that you have?
What are you doing here?
What is a fellow drow doing here?
What is a fellow drow doing here?
I would like to see what items you have.
I must take my leave of you.  Farewell.
I wanted to let you know that I have not dealt with the guard barracks as of yet.
I wanted to let you know that the guard barracks has been dealt with.
I wanted to let you know that the guard barracks has been dealt with.
I wanted to let you know that the guard barracks has been dealt with... but I think that sleep potion killed them.
I wanted to let you know that the guard barracks has been dealt with... but I think that sleep potion killed them.
I would like to see what items you have.
Farewell.
What would you have of me?
Very well, I shall do so.
I have allied with Iyachtu Xvim as well.
I know the priest you speak of.  He is dead.
I have spoken with him already.  He wants me to perform the ritual.
I have spoken with him already.  He wanted to discuss the ritual with me, but I was not interested.
What would you have of me?
No.  I have not.
No.  Toral Sorn, the priest of Ilmater, is dead.
No.  Toral Sorn, the priest of Ilmater, is dead.
Yes.  I have performed the purification ritual.
No.  I have not.
No.  I have not.  I refused to do so.
No.  I have not.  I have allied with Iyachtu Xvim instead.
No.  I have not.  I have allied with Iyachtu Xvim instead.
Never mind the ritual;  I would like to see what items you have.
Farewell for now.
Very well, farewell.
And what might that be?
Wait.  Why am I in need of such luck?
Wait.  Why am I in need of such luck?
Wait.  Why am I in need of such luck?
Very well, farewell.
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
I would like to see what items you have.
Forgive me.  I have overstepped my bounds.
Women do not rule here in the surface world, Riki.
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
I would like to see what items you have.
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
What information would that be?
I would like to see what items you have.
Isair and Madae shall still fall, Riki.
Isair and Madae shall still fall, Riki.
And what might that be?
I will consider the matter.  Farewell.
I will consider the matter.  Farewell.
What matters?
What matters?
Yes, I would like to see your wares.
No.  Farewell, Riki.
